DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare average joint motion joint axis orientation hindfoot bone patient diagnose adult-acquired flatfoot disorder ( AAFD ) control group patient without foot deformity , use weight-bearing CT technology .
DOC.criteria: Symptomatic group : 1. adult patient ( age 18 80 year old ) diagnose Stage 2 AAFD 1. previous surgery 2. infection 3. tumor affect foot 4. pregnancy Control group : 1. adult patient ( age 18 80 year old ) without foot deformity 1. history previous foot ankle surgery 2. foot deformity 3. known foot ankle pathology 4. pregnancy
